original_title: Utta Danella - Der Verlobte meiner besten Freundin
overview: Katharina and Elena are best friends. After a year of training in Canada Elena has now returned to Bavaria - with her Canadian fianc√© Tom. Elena's father would rather be marrying down-to-earth Markus. But he is with Katharina. But then Katharina and Tom fall in love.
title: Utta Danella - Der Verlobte meiner besten Freundin
